hero.title: Hero Section
hero.content: Alex works as a designer who uses code and currently freelances as a web developer and Graphic Designer based in Stockholm. You can contact him via email or Instagram.

about.title: About / Approach
about.content:
Currently freelancing as web developer and graphic designer based in Stockholm. I’ve worked across formats—from posters and digital layouts to animated visuals and short-form video content.

Curious by nature, I enjoy exploring new tools and creative methods that strengthen my core practice in design and development. Whether working solo or as part of a team, I try to bring adaptability, intention, and a genuine passion for visual arts and technology to every project.

In addition to applied work I continue a practice of personal and collaborative visual art and moving image work.

education.title: Education
content: Gerrit Rietveld Academie – BA Art & Design, Graphic Design
